snippet: The assault on tradition implied by the name turns out to be fairly tame, but it is a good place for seasonal food that flirts with French ideas in exciting ways.
abstract: Pete Wells reviews Rebelle restaurant in Manhattan.
lead_paragraph: The assault on tradition implied by the name turns out to be fairly tame, but it is a good place for seasonal food that flirts with French ideas in exciting ways.

headline.print_headline: Seasonal Food in a French Flirtation
